Tap the mic and say what to add. Examples:
• Expenses: "bought shoes for 300", "paid bill 200", "ordered food for 80", "it cost me 50 for coffee", "ate at a restaurant for 120"
• Income: "received salary 15000", "earned 5000 from freelance", "bonus 3000"
• More: "loan 5000 to David", "saving 1000", "budget 3000 for food", "goal 10000 for vacation"

onboarding.title: Welcome Tour
onboarding.step1Desc: This is your financial dashboard. It gives you a complete overview of your financial situation at a glance -- balances, income, expenses, and trends.
onboarding.step2Desc: These stat cards show your most important numbers: total balance, income, expenses, and more. They update automatically based on the selected date range.
onboarding.step3Desc: Use the date picker to filter your data by any time period. Choose from presets like 'This month' or 'Last year', or set a custom range.
onboarding.step4Desc: Click here to customize your dashboard layout. Add, remove, resize and rearrange widgets to create the perfect overview for your needs.
onboarding.step5Desc: View all your transactions in one place. Search, filter, edit categories, and manage your financial records. Bulk actions let you update multiple transactions at once.
onboarding.step6Desc: Upload bank statements, credit card bills, receipts, or any financial document. Our OCR and AI will automatically extract and categorize your transactions.
onboarding.step7Desc: Track your income and expenses separately with dedicated pages. Add manual entries, view breakdowns by category, and monitor your cash flow over time.
onboarding.step8Desc: Set savings goals and track your progress. The system calculates how much you need to save monthly and provides AI-powered tips to help you reach your targets.
onboarding.step9Desc: Set monthly budgets for each spending category. Get alerts when you're approaching or exceeding your limits, and track your spending discipline.
onboarding.step10Desc: Generate detailed financial reports for any period. View income vs. expenses breakdowns, category analysis, and export reports as PDF.
onboarding.step11Desc: Configure your profile, manage bank accounts and credit cards, set up categories, enable two-factor authentication, and personalize your experience.
onboarding.step12Desc: Look for help icons and tooltips throughout the app for contextual guidance. The AI tips panel provides personalized financial recommendations based on your data.
onboarding.welcomeDesc: Would you like a quick guided tour? We'll walk you through every page and feature.
